Pre-Game Insights: The Suns have won nine of the last 11 over the 76ers, including six-straight wins in Phoenix
The two losses over the 11-game stretch were the last two meetings in Philadelphia
The Suns are 31-8 in their last 39 games against the Sixers in Phoenix
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns dropped to 15-18 on the season following a 126-108 loss to the Pacers on Saturday night in Indianapolis
With a win tonight, Mike Budenholzer would win his 500th career regular season game as an NBA head coach, becoming the 38th coach in league history to the milestone
Kevin Durant moved into sole possession of 2nd place for the most 20+ point games in Christmas Day games (11) with his 27 points on Dec. 25
Others: The game marked Durant's 16th game this season of scoring 25+ points and his fifth-straight
Devin Booker posted 20 points to go along with a game-high 9 assists and 8 rebounds
Ryan Dunn added 13 points on 6-of-11 shooting from the field, 4 rebounds, an assist and a block
Grayson Allen led all Suns reserves with 13 points on 5-of-10 shooting from the field, including a 3-of-7 mark from three-point range
Monte Morris would be the only other Suns player to reach double figure scoring, tallying 12 points
